page.title: 11MOTHER'S PRIDE BAKERY(P.1)
page.content: In our area is the{Mother's Pride} Bakery. It is situated on Main Street, Watnall. It provides bread for this area and employment for many of the people living nearby.The size of the building and it's ground is 10 acres, but only 4 acres is covered by the building. There are 3 floors and 10 departments. These departments are for {clerical}and{administration purposes, {sales,production,despatch}and{ {distribution,plant maintenance,hygiene {stores,personnel welfare,security}and {garage.}It was built in 1950 and extensions have been built later.The site was chosen because it was close to the original bakery at Kimberley. There is also good access to the M1 motorway for easy distribution.Several different types of machinery are used.
